item.title: trainer
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 基本用法 下面是使用的一个例子，重点是TrainingArg和data_collator。 dataset = LineByLineTextDataset(tokenizer=tokenizer, file_path='./text.txt', block_size=512) data_collator = DataCollatorForLanguageModeling( tokenizer=tokenizer, mlm=True, mlm_probability=0.15 ) training_args = TrainingArguments( output_dir='./outputs/', overwrite_output_dir=True, num_train_epochs=100, per_device_train_batch_size=16, save_steps=5000, ) trainer = Trainer( model=model, args=training_args,

item.title: 情感分析
item.author: vllbc
